reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's small but that's what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I purposely purchased a small broom. I wanted something to sweep my baseboards with for weekly cleanings. The brushes are soft enough that they do not cause any marring. I also needed something small enough to fit into my small utility cabinet and this broom does the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little broom
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for a small broom. Sturdy with soft bristles & does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Using as a short broom
reviews.reviewText: First, ignore the reviews that claim the sections don't have the correct male/female ends to assemble it. Although it appears the male/female ends are wrong, they do in fact assemble very securely. Second, ignore the reviews complaining of receiving a used/dirty broom. It is obvious in the review photos, that some reviewers do not understand what "flagged" bristles means.I wanted a smallish broom, in terms of width of the sweeping head and overall height. I use a broom 2-3 times a day to sweep cat litter (pelletized pine) in the laundry room, with a quick one-handed sweep. The petite sweeping head on this broom is perfect for the small task. It also allows me to easily sweep in tight areas, and then into my Oxo dustpan.I omitted one of the sections of the broom handle to make it shorter. The shortened version (with one section omitted) is exactly 37 inches from the hanging hole to the bottom of the bristles. I can't speak to how it would perform at full height in typical two-handed sweeping, but it is perfect for the quick one-handed sweeping I do in a small area, and performs its task very well.The broom feels substantial and sturdy without being too heavy. Overall, it was a good value.The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, is that I would have preferred the option to buy the broom without a dustpan. I did not need nor want this dustpan, so it went directly into a box for Goodwill, which is a big waste of plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bristle part is pretty small. I should've paid more attention to the width but it's much smaller than the one I already had

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Not heavy at all. Worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IF I WERE A FLYING WITCH, THIS WOULD BE MY EVERYDAY BROOM!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Best cheap broom I ever bought, and Lord God, I have bought them all. I have two sons. They for years, have taken every broom I bought, and decided to play swords or lightsabers with them. I went from buying the most expensive nicest brooms and then wondering what the heck- why are they all bending! Well, I had to switch to Dollar Tree brooms for years just because I knew those two boys would take my broom no matter where I hid it, and play their Little Star wars games. No more! This broom from the Basic collection of Amazon, is FABULOUS!!!! 😍😍😍! Oh my god! Sturdy, just the right height, very good bristles. If I were a flying witch this would be my broom! Do not hesitate to order, I will be getting another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Arrived broken at the neck where the handle screws in. No reason it should’ve been broken. It comes unassembled in a very sturdy corrugated cardboard box which appeared undamaged. We tried some glue that is supposed to fuse plastic, but that didn’t work on this type of plastic. We tried Krazy glue, that didn’t work. We taped it, which is a temporary fix. I planned to send it back, but I just wanted to see how well it worked first to see if I wanted to get another one or get a refund and look further. It was so clunky and hard to use that I decided to not replace it. The bristles are stiff – they flex and then snap back, scattering the swept pieces again. And the dustpan house has a ridge that you have to sweep over. Really a bad design. Unfortunately, I’m stuck with it. They gave me a refund but didn’t want me to send it back. So now I have this barely functional broom that I don’t know what to do with. I got the refund, but I’ve got this stupid white elephant that isn’t good for anything but isn’t quite bad enough to throw away yet. I suppose the metal handle is recyclable, but the rest is landfill.
Più piccola delle scope tradizionali, perfetta per il mio uso, ovvero raccogliere residui di sabbietta dei gatti vicino alla lettiera, sono soddisfatta.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: A Must-Have Cleaning Solution for Any House
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought the Amazon Basics Dustpan Broom Set in Blue&White and I am thrilled with my purchase. The set is made with high-quality materials, and it features a durable broom head that picks up even the smallest dirt particles with ease. The dustpan is also well-designed, with a raised lip to prevent debris from sliding over the edge. What I appreciate most is how easy it is to use - the dustpan clips onto the broom handle for convenient storage and the sweep angle is perfect to ensure all dirt and dust is picked up.The set is lightweight, simple to store, and easy to maneuver. What's more, the blue and white color scheme is really attractive and makes it easy to spot the broom and dustpan in my closet. I have used other brands' dustpan and broom sets in the past, but this has been the best one so far. It really helps me keep my home cleaner than before, and I recommend it to everyone who needs a simple, but effective cleaning solution. If you're in the market for a practical, affordable, and high-quality dustpan and broom set, this is definitely the one to go for!
